title: Optimizing lead-free Cs2AgBiBr6 double perovskite solar cells: insights from SCAPS and FDTD simulations
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4311-4323
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00958D, Paper
A. S. M. Mosabbir, M. S. Sadek, Minhaz Mahmood, M. Mofazzal Hosain, Suhaila Sepeai, Puvaneswaran Chelvanathan, Sakhr M. Sultan, K. Sopian, Mohd Adib Ibrahim, K. Sobayel
This research uses an integrated simulation approach with SCAPS and FDTD to design and model a Cs2AgBiBr6 perovskite solar cell, examining its photovoltaic parameters with NiO and WO3 as hole and electron transport layers.
